document_data.name: ''Spellstrike''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spellstrike''''' was a [[weapon quality]] that could be applied to all kinds of weapons.
document_data.Power: The wielder of a weapon imbued with the ''spellstrike'' quality could use the stored [[magic]] to protect themselves against harmful magic or similar effects directed at them.
document_data.Creation: A [[cleric]] used the ''[[resistance]]'' [[spell]] to add the ''spellstrike'' quality to a weapon.
